import React, { useState } from "react"; import livecasinoimage from "../../assets/livecasiono.jpg"; import betswizz from "../../assets/Betswiz.jpeg"; import hoticon from '../../assets/game-icon-hot-mobile.svg'; import newicon from '../../assets/game-icon-new-mobile.svg'; const images = [ { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 1" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 2" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 3" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 4" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 5" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 6" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 7" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 8" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 9" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 10" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 11" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 12" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 13" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 14" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 15" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 16" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 17" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 18" }, { src: betswizz, alt: "Betswiz Image 19" }, { src: livecasinoimage, alt: "Betswiz Image 20" }, ]; const itemsPerPage = 10; // Number of images per page const totalPages = Math.ceil(images.length / itemsPerPage); const LiveCasino = () => { const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); // Get images for the current page const indexOfLastImage = currentPage * itemsPerPage; const indexOfFirstImage = indexOfLastImage - itemsPerPage; const currentImages = images.slice(indexOfFirstImage, indexOfLastImage); const handlePageChange = (page) => { if (page >= 1 && page <= totalPages) { setCurrentPage(page); } }; return (

{currentImages.map((image, index) => (
))}
{Array.from({ length: totalPages }, (_, index) => ( ))}
); }; export default LiveCasino;
